Company Name.description: Validation: LEV_DISTANCE. The company matched against the list of companies with 80% similarity

Shareholder ID Number.description: Validation: SA_ID_NUMBER. The ID number of the shareholder matched against the algorithm for SA ID numbers(SA_ID_NUMBER)

Shareholder Number.description: Validation: REGEX. The shareholder number of the

Shareholder Full Name.description: Validation: REGEX. The shareholder full name of the

Address 1.description: Validation: VALUE_IN_GROUP. At least one of the address lines must have a value

Postal Code.description: Validation: REGEX. Check if it is a valid postal code

Domicile Code.description: Validation: ENUM. The domicile code of the shareholder that exists in the COUNTRY_CODE list

Payment Date.description: Validation: UNIX_DATE. The payment date of the shareholder

Amount Paid.description: Validation: DECIMAL_AMOUNT. The amount paid of the shareholder

Bank Name.description: Validation: LEV_DISTANCE. The bank name of the shareholder matched against the list of banks with 80% similarity

Bank Account Number.description: Validation: BANK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER. The bank account number of the shareholder

Payment Reference.description: Validation: REGEX. The payment reference of the shareholder
